name: Gemini Creative Content Suite
description: An all-in-one creative suite powered by the Gemini API. Generate stories, create and stylize stunning images, visualize concepts, craft brand slogans, generate dynamic videos, chat with AI personas, get research answers, write recipes, analyze images, generate and debug code (including Python), draft emails, plan workouts and meals, craft social media posts, analyze documents, plan detailed trips, compare an expandable hub of specialized AI models, and save your best ideas in a cloud-synced prompt library.
